title: Interior of Hopkins Hall: Classroom for Historial Department Including History of Art
inscriptions: l.c. typed on label: Photograph taken in Hopkins Hall about 1900/ (The label came with it.)/ Equipment for instructing the history of art included a small/ portable screen and a projector run by a gas flame.  Under such/ conditions the talents of the teacher had to be (and were) very/ considerable.; l.c. on old label: Class Room for Historical Department, Including History of Art.
